value.title: StarCraft 2: ULTRALISKS VERSUS PROTOSS? (soO vs Zest)
value.excerpt: Ultralisks are uncommon in StarCraft 2 currently. Especially in the Zerg versus Protoss matchup we barely ever see Ultras simply because Protoss has many different counters available to deal with them. In this professional match between Zest and soO, soO gets a solid advantage by focusing on Swarm Hosts
